results.text: Your athleticism extends vertically as much as it goes horizontally. For the next hour, you may jump over obstacles that are half the jump’s total distance (instead of a quarter of the distance).

You are an all-around athlete. You ignore the movement penalties imposed by climbing, swimming, or crawling for 1 minute. If you already have a Climb or Swim speed, it instead doubles for the next minute.
You are suddenly capable of a great feat of strength, even if it’s just for a short time. The amount of weight you can lift, drag, or push is doubled until you take a long rest.
You plant your feet and shift your center of gravity down. You gain an expertise die on your next check made to resist being knocked prone.

You may treat improvised weapons that have a weight less than or equal to your Strength score as having the thrown (30/80) property and you are considered proficient when using them as thrown improvised weapons. This bonus lasts until you take a short or a long rest.
Adrenaline surges through you, giving you an edge. You have advantage on your next Strength check or saving throw to avoid or escape a grapple.
